desc: NFT IDを入力して、NFTを検索できます。
nft-id-decoded-data: NFT IDからの解析データ
nft-not-found-on-that-network: このNFTは<1>{{network}}</1>では見つかりませんでした。

attention-texts.no-uri: That NFT lacks an URI, it is incompatible with commonly accepted standards.
attention-texts.no-metadata: The given URI is missing the metadata for that NFT. It goes against commonly accepted standards.
attention-texts.not-transferable: This NFT is not transferable; it can only be transferred to and from the issuer.
attention-texts.burnable: The issuer (or an entity authorized by the issuer) can destroy the NFT.
attention-texts.no-digest: There is no Digest provided for that NFT. The NFT integrity cannot be verified.
attention-texts.invalid-digest: The NFT integrity check failed. The Digest does not match the NFT metadata.
